scripts.dev: rm -rf dist/yarn && node build.mjs && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir dist/yarn/pkg && serve dist/yarn -p 3000
scripts.dev:trunk:debug: rm -rf dist/trunk && RUSTFLAGS='-A warnings -C opt-level=0' RUST_BACKTRACE=1 TRUNK=true trunk serve --log debug
scripts.build:release: rm -rf dist/release && RUSTFLAGS='-C opt-level=3' NODE_ENV=production node build.mjs && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir dist/release/web/pkg --release
scripts.build:desktop: rm -rf dist/release && RUSTFLAGS='-C opt-level=3' NODE_ENV=production node build.mjs && wasm-pack build --target bundler --out-dir dist/release/desktop/pkg --release
scripts.build:test: rm -rf dist/test && node build.mjs && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir dist/test/pkg --dev
